meanings.definition: Semiweeklies: publications that are issued twice a week
meanings.sent1: The semiweeklies contain news from the first half of the week.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy reading the semiweeklies to stay updated on local events.
meanings.sent3: The semiweeklies had a funny cartoon about the midweek slump.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a series of semiweeklies, each issue bringing new challenges.
meanings.sent5: The semiweeklies are like clockwork, arriving every Tuesday and Thursday.

meanings.definition: Semiweeklies: the act of publishing something twice a week
meanings.sent1: The semiweeklies require a dedicated team to meet the tight deadlines.
meanings.sent2: Publishing semiweeklies demands efficient time management.
meanings.sent3: The semiweeklies publishing schedule keeps everyone on their toes.
meanings.sent4: Her workload felt like a never-ending stream of semiweeklies.
meanings.sent5: The semiweeklies production process is a well-oiled machine.
